info.plot: A man and his brother on a mission of revenge become trapped in a harrowing occult experiment dating back to the Third Reich.
Moronic best friends get themselves locked inside the Bio-Dome, a science experiment, along with a group of environmental scientists for one year.
Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy-maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.

Dot (Belle), a young deaf and mute woman, is sent to live with her godparents (Falco and Donovan) and their daughter (Cuthbert). The new addition to the household realizes that everything is not copacetic in the home, and the family's dark come to light.
Harry Caine, a blind writer, reaches this moment in time when he has to heal his wounds from 14 years back. He was then still known by his real name, Mateo Blanco, and directing his last movie.
A young Arab man is sent to a French prison where he becomes a mafia kingpin.
Upon discovering a den of corrupt policemen, a fresh-faced journalist makes a shaky allies in a jaded reporter and investigator for a powerful district attorney.
Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that it's true. But that's not the only surprise.
A courier for a local crime lord must deliver a mysterious package while being chased by a horde of unusual gangsters.
A family of serial killers stalk a young woman out to find the father she's never known.
A businessman finds he and his friends the prisoners of a sadistic judge and his equally odd family in the backwoods of a bizarre mansion.
A member of Parliament falls passionately in love with his son's fiancee despite the dangers of discovery.
A young girl who was missing reappears, but she claims to be someone else entirely.
A comedy about a man, his best friend, and the woman they both adore watching their lives fly by.

title: Assassination of a High School President

info.plot: At a Catholic high school, the popular girl teams up with a sophomore newspaper reporter to investigate a case of stolen SAT exams. Once the duo target their suspects, a larger conspiracy is unearthed.

A platoon of eagles and vultures attacks the residents of a small town. Many people die. It's not known what caused the flying menace to attack. Two people manage to fight back, but will they survive Birdemic?

On a stormy Saturday afternoon, six students from Crestview Academy begin to meet horrible fates as they serve out their detentions. Is a fellow student to blame, or perhaps Crestview's alleged ghosts are behind the terrible acts?
After she quits her lucrative job, Olivia finds herself unsure about her future and her relationships with her successful and wealthy friends.

Tim Lippe has no idea what he's in for when he's sent to Cedar Rapids, Iowa to represent his company at an annual insurance convention, where he soon finds himself under the "guidance" of three convention veterans.
A guy fed up with his job and married to a cheating wife reluctantly mentors a rebellious teen.
A godless man is recruited by a secret organization who works to combat demonic possessions in order to prepare a new generation in the battle against evil forces.
A woman with an unusual birth defect comes to a doctor who has an unorthodox solution to make the best of her situation.
An FSB officer falls in love with his agent, an American woman, who works as a trader in a Russian bank.
When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss's job.
A sinful martial arts expert wants to start a new tranquil life, only to be hunted by a determined detective and his former master.
Sought by police and criminals, a small-time huckster makes a deal with a TV newsman for protection.
A young boy and a bunch of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.
An impromptu fashion shoot at a book store brings about a new fashion model discovery in the shop clerk.
Tommy, Angelica, Chuckie, Phil an Lil get lost while going on vacation, now they must find the way back to their home
Set against the backdrop of boxing at the Naval Academy, centers on a young man from the wrong side of the tracks whose dream of attending Annapolis becomes a reality.
To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of super-intelligent rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.

title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day

info.plot: Alexander wakes up with gum in his hair, and things just get worse as his day progresses.

title: Tim and Eric's Billion Dollar Movie

info.plot: Two guys get a billion dollars to make a movie, only to watch their dream run off course. In order to make the money back, they then attempt to revitalize a failing shopping mall.
When four 40-something college friends meet up for their annual reunion, things start to spiral out of control, and a pact they made as young men is revisited.
As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.
After suffering a career-ending injury, a former college football star aligns himself with one of the most renowned touts in the sports-gambling business.
The Freeling family have a new house, but their troubles with supernatural forces don't seem to be over.

title: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers

info.plot: Ten years after his original massacre, the invalid Michael Myers awakens and returns to Haddonfield to kill his seven-year-old niece on Halloween. Can Dr. Loomis stop him?
A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.
Frank Drebin comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.
An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho whom he met that evening at a coffee shop.
A man trapped in a car wreck at the bottom of a ravine must overcome incredible odds to survive.
Several people start receiving voice-mails from their future selves - messages which include the date, time, and some of the details of their deaths.
A woman tries to straighten out her life, even as her past as a con-woman comes back to haunt her.

Ryden Malby graduates from college and is forced to move back into her childhood home with her eccentric family, while she attempts to find a job, the right guy, and just a hint of where her life is headed.
A brave unicorn and a magician fight an evil king who is obsessed with attempting to capture the world's unicorns.
A brilliant scientist left for dead returns to exact revenge on the people who burned him alive.
Twenty-four hours elapse on the stoop of a Hell's Kitchen tenement as a microcosm of the American melting pot interacts with each other during a summer heatwave.

A dramatization of the shocking Barbara Daly Baekeland murder case, which happened in a posh London flat on Friday 17 November 1972. The bloody crime caused a stir on both sides of the Atlantic and remains one of the most memorable American Tragedies...
A man conjures up a gigantic vengeance demon called Pumpkinhead to destroy the teenagers who accidentally killed his son.

A street-wise teen from Baltimore who has been raised by a single mother travels to New York City to spend the Christmas holiday with his estranged relatives, where he embarks on a surprising and inspirational journey.
A young English boy befriends a talking bear he finds at a London train station. A live-action feature based on the series of popular children's books by Michael Bond.
28th century soldier Mitch Hunter leads a fight against an army of underworld Mutants.

In this sequel to the 1980 classic, two children are stranded on a beautiful island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together and eventually become tanned teenagers in love.
A 1970s-set comedy centered on three young working class friends in a dreary suburb of Reading.

title: Why Did I Get Married Too?

info.plot: Four couples find themselves struggling to save their marriages once again on their annual marriage retreat, while each of them battle through financial, physical, mental, and emotional issues.
Arn, the son of a high-ranking Swedish nobleman is educated in a monastery and sent to the Holy Land as a knight templar to do penance for a forbidden love.
An ensemble piece examining the health risks involved in the fast food industry and its environmental and social consequences as well.

Doctors are baffled when an expectant mother wakes to find her nearly-to-term pregnancy apparently disappear overnight. Police investigate the situation as a missing child, and only her husband and brother trust her version of events.
A devastating and heartrending take on grizzly bear activists Timothy Treadwell and Amie Huguenard, who were killed in October of 2003 while living among grizzlies in Alaska.
Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice gets a Bollywood treatment.
An Upstate New York family is torn apart during the American Civil War.
An average baseball player comes out of seemingly nowhere to become a legendary player with almost divine talent.
A college professor begins to suspect that his neighbour is a terrorist.
Three years ago entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease, now the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind!
A Manhattan ambulance paramedic, overworked and haunted by visions of his failures, fights to keep a tenuous grip on his clarity.
A trio of girls set out to change the male-dominated environment of the Seven Oaks college campus, and to rescue their fellow students from depression, grunge and low standards of every kind.

title: History of the World: Part I

info.plot: Mel Brooks brings his one-of-a-kind comic touch to the history of mankind covering events from the Old Testament to the French Revolution in a series of episodic comedy vignettes.
A burgeoning stand-up comedian struggles with the stress of a stalled career, a stale relationship, and the wild spurts of severe sleepwalking he is desperate to ignore.

A group of men head to a remote village to help one of their friends get over his divorce; when they get there, though, they discover that all the women have been infected with a virus that makes them man-hating cannibals.
Four horror/sci-fi segments directed by four famous directors which are their own versions of classic stories from Rod Serling's landmark television series.
The fortunes of a husband and wife differ drastically after they divorce.
A Jewish boy goes to an elite prep school in the 1950's and hides his religion until a jealous bigot forces it out in the open.
Red Riding Hood is training in the group of Sister Hoods, when she and the Wolf are called to examine the sudden mysterious disappearance of Hansel and Gretel.
A brain tumor allows a person to change the past by reflecting at relevant pictures.
A woman and her sister begin to link a mysterious tunnel to a series of disappearances, including that of her own husband.
When a young doctor suspects she may not be alone in her new Brooklyn loft, she learns that her landlord has formed a frightening obsession with her.
Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.
The events leading up to an 11:14 PM car crash, from five very different perspectives.
A mercenary goes after his ex-girlfriend, a singer who has been kidnapped by a gang.
A street smart runner develops an intense rivalry with an equally ambitious wealthy young athlete.
A couple on their honeymoon in Morocco survive a deadly car accident in the middle of the desert.

title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof

info.plot: Brick, an alcoholic ex-football player, drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife, Maggie. His reunion with his father, Big Daddy, who is dying of cancer, jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.

title: The Naked Gun 2-1/2: The Smell of Fear

info.plot: Lieutenant Drebin discovers that his ex-girlfriend's new beau is involved in a plot to kidnap a scientist who advocates solar energy.

When an overachieving high school student decides to travel around the country to choose the perfect college, her overprotective cop father also decides to accompany her in order to keep her on the straight and narrow.
After one too many run ins with the law, a punk teenager from a working class background is sent to prep school by his frustrated dad, and learns a thing or two.
A career driven professional from Manhattan is wooed by a young painter, who also happens to be the son of her psychoanalyst.
A poignant story of forbidden love and the loss of innocence set in England prior to the Second World War.
Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.

When his son's body is found in a humiliating accident, a lonely high school teacher inadvertently attracts an overwhelming amount of community and media attention after covering up the truth with a phony suicide note.

Two bumbling store clerks inadvertently erase the footage from all of the tapes in their video rental store. In order to keep the business running, they re-shoot every film in the store with their own camera, with a budget of zero dollars.
After helping a cat, a young girl finds herself involuntarily engaged to a cat prince in a magical world where her only hope of freedom lies with a dapper cat statuette come to life.
Astronauts search for solutions to save a dying Earth by searching on Mars, only to have the mission go terribly awry.
Producers Max Bialystock and Leo Bloom make money by producing a sure-fire flop.
A young Jewish man develops a fiercely anti-Semitic worldview. Based on the true story of a KKK member in the 1960s who was revealed to be Jewish by a New York Times reporter.
An actor (Freeman) prepping for an upcoming role meets a quirky grocery clerk (Vega), and the pair hit the road to show one another their respective worlds.

Using his most ingenious invention, the WABAC machine, Mr. Peabody and his adopted boy Sherman hurtle back in time to experience world-changing events first-hand and interact with some of the greatest characters of all time. They find themselves in a race to repair history and save the future.
Based on the video game, Alone in the Dark focuses on Edward Carnby, a detective of the paranormal, who slowly unravels a mysterious events with deadly results.
The story of Aung San Suu Kyi as she becomes the core of Burma's democracy movement, and her relationship with her husband, writer Michael Aris.
A woman provokes sensual awakenings in a group of adolescent boys.
A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.
An inside look at Italy's modern-day crime families.
A young woman pretends to be pregnant in order to avoid being fired from her job. When that gets her special treatment by everyone involved in her life, she tries to keep up the lie for nine months.
A sleazy cable-TV programmer begins to see his life and the future of media spin out of control in a very unusual fashion when he acquires a new kind of programming for his station.
Lighthearted suspense film about a phony psychic/con artist and her taxi driver/private investigator boyfriend who encounter a pair of serial kidnappers while trailing a missing heir in California.

title: A Love Song for Bobby Long

info.plot: A headstrong young woman returns to New Orleans after the death of her estranged mother.
Spoof of romantic comedies which focuses on a man, his crush, his parents, and her father.
A dramatization of the 1986 Reykjavik summit between Ronald Reagan and Mikhail Gorbachev.
Two assassins agree to work together as one tries to avenge his wife and the other collect a reward for a job.
A police officer promises to share his lottery ticket with a waitress in lieu of a tip.
A group of teenagers encourage each other's bad behavior in a chatroom "Chelsea Teens!".
An ex-mercenary is forced out of isolation when three mysterious men kidnap and brainwash the city's children afflicted with the Geostigma disease.
The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidently launched into orbit.
Antwone Fisher, a young navy man, is forced to see a psychiatrist after a violent outburst against a fellow crewman. During the course of treatment a painful past is revealed and a new hope begins.
A gang of young thieves flee Paris during the violent aftermath of a political election, only to hole up at an Inn run by neo-Nazis.
Pregnant Sally unknowingly falls for the stepson of the deceased father of her baby and has to deal with his homicidal family.
It's five years later and Tony Manero's Saturday Night Fever is still burning. Now he's strutting toward his biggest challenger yet - making it as a dancer on the Broadway stage.
Set in 1944 Italy, the story of four black American soldiers who get trapped in a Tuscan village during WWII.
A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a smoldering settler/rancher conflict forces him to act.
Religious conspiracy collides with urban crime in a story told from multiple perspectives.

Taking place towards the end of WWII, 500 American Soldiers have been entrapped in a camp for 3 years. Beginning to give up hope they will ever be rescued, a group of Rangers goes on a dangerous mission to try and save them.
A specialist carrier is hired to deliver a mysterious case to the underworld's most dangerous hitman.
A dramatization of the battle that turned out to be the turning point of the Pacific Theatre of World War II.
An account of Baron Munchausen's supposed travels and fantastical experiences with his band of misfits.
Dick Goodwin discovers game shows are fixed: Charles Van Doren is fed answers so he beats Herbie Stempel.
A police officer uncovers the real identity of his houseguest, an IRA terrorist in hiding.

title: Gotti: In the Shadow of My Father

info.plot: The story of crime boss John Gotti and his son.
The story of a woman who is slowly losing her sight whilst trying to investigate the mysterious death of her twin sister.
If a clock could count down to the moment you meet your soul mate, would you want to know?
A young man with the power to time travel attempts to solve the mystery of his girlfriend's death.
When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.
Having escaped, Jason Voorhees is back, hockey mask and all, to continue his murderous rampage across Camp Crystal Lake.
In Africa during WW1, a gin-swilling riverboat owner/captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.
A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to succeed with a new partner.
A black comedy about two 19th century grave robbers who find a lucrative business providing cadavers for an Edinburgh medical school.
In the Australian surfing town of Eagle's Nest, a young woman is the thread that binds three tales of murder, blackmail and revenge.
A forty-something preschool teacher looks to the personals for a change of pace and a relationship, with hilarious results.
1994. Three overage students go on a wild ride while crashing graduation parties.

A newbie guard for an armored truck company is coerced by his veteran coworkers to steal a truck containing $42 million. But a wrinkle in their supposedly foolproof plan divides the group, leading to a potentially deadly resolution.
A poetic road trip through Pulitzer prize-winning CK Williams' life.
The inseparable duo try to organize a rock concert while Wayne must fend off a record producer who has an eye for his girlfriend.
A reverend puts an engaged couple through a grueling marriage preparation course to see if they are meant to be married in his church.
In what would cause a fantastic media frenzy, Clifford Irving sells his bogus biography of Howard Hughes to a premiere publishing house in the early 1970s.
After he's shot during a heist in East L.A., an armored truck driver wrestles with rehabilitation and tracking down the man who committed the crime.
A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to find the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.
When a foreign exchange student arrives in a small upstate New York town, she challenges the dynamics of her host family's relationships and alters their lives forever.
A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.
Musical about a widow who accepts a job as a live-in governess of the King of Siam's children.
A young martial artist is caught between respecting his pacifist father's wishes or stopping a group of disrespectful foreigners from stealing precious artifacts.
A man obsessed with conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of his theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, in order to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.
When a group of friends decides to follow a car they've seen posted on an Amber Alert, things start to go very wrong.
A documentary on 85-year-old sushi master Jiro Ono, his business in the Ginza Tokio Subway station, and his relationship with his son and eventual heir, Yoshikazu.
In London, a street dealer's life spins out of control over the course of one week after he borrows money from his supplier on what's supposed to be a sure thing.
A drama set centered around the war between Russia and Georgia, and focused on an American journalist, his cameraman, and a Georgian native who become caught in the crossfire.
A soccer star jailed for assault leads a group of inmates in a match against prison guards.
A group of medical students devise a deadly game: to see which one of them can commit the perfect murder.
A woman struggles to find a way to live her life after the death of her husband and child.

title: Street Fighter: The Legend of Chun-Li

info.plot: When a teenager, Chun-Li witnesses the kidnapping of her father by wealthy crime lord M. Bison. When she grows up, she goes into a quest for vengeance and becomes the famous crime-fighter of the Street Fighter universe.
An upper-middle-class couple's life is destroyed when their only child is kidnapped and killed. Obsessed with revenge, the couple seizes an opportunity to kidnap the killer.
A website manager enlists the help of his two friends in order to convince the owners of his favorite coffee shop -- which doubles as his office -- not to turn their business into a bar.
In London during World War II, this is the story of Wendy's daughter, Jane, who is kidnapped by Captain Hook and Peter Pan must come to the rescue.
Fat Albert and the Cosby Kids come to life and step out of their animated, inner-city Philadelphia world.
A drag queen comes to the rescue of a man who, after inheriting his father's shoe factory, needs to diversify his product if he wants to keep the business afloat.
A neurotic writer working on his new film gets into a tricky situation when an A-list actress shows interest in the role intended for his girlfriend.
Left alone when her sister goes on vacation, a young beauty finds herself besieged on all sides by the demons of her past.
A look at Germany's terrorist group, The Red Army Faction (RAF), which organized bombings, robberies, kidnappings and assassinations in the late 1960s and '70s.

Set in the Channel Islands on the eve of D Day,two Kiwi commandos, sent to destroy German gun emplacements to distract Hitler's forces away from Normandy, discover a Nazi occult plot to unleash demonic forces to win the war.
Detective Danny Fisher discovers his girlfriend has been kidnapped by a ex-con tied to Fisher's past, and he'll have to successfully complete 12 challenges in order to secure her safe release.

Eight unsuspecting high school seniors at a posh boarding school, who delight themselves on playing games of lies, come face-to-face with terror and learn that nobody believes a liar - even when they're telling the truth.
Claude leaves the family ranch in Oklahoma for New York where he is rapidly indoctrinated into the youth subculture and subsequently drafted.

An heiress who's been shut inside her apartment building for nearly two decades is forced to confront her fears after one of her neighbors is killed and a detective arrives to begin the investigation.
A Texas baseball coach makes the major league after agreeing to try out if his high school team made the playoffs.
Based on the true events of the only case in US History where a spirit caused the death of a man.
Set in a world with memory implants, Robin Williams plays a cutter, someone with the power of final edit over people's recorded histories. His latest assignment is one that puts him in danger.
An FBI deep-woods tracker captures a trained assassin who has made a sport of hunting humans.
Two friends travel across America to expose the truth behind girl-against-girl "crime".

Two dim-witted teenage boys, are forced to save the fast-food restaurant they work at from going out of business, despite a new-and-improved burger joint opening across the street that want to be the "Top Dog" in the fast food industry.
The wife of a cruel headmaster and his mistress conspire to kill him, but after the murder is committed, his body disappears, and strange events begin to plague the two women.
A government agent stumbles upon an alien conspiracy to conquer earth. Using a blue liquid made by the aliens to make soldiers stronger, he becomes The Prototype-the only hope for mankind.
A friendship is put to the ultimate test when two best friends wind up in bed together.
When his family goes away for the summer, a so far faithful husband is tempted by a beautiful neighbor (Marilyn Monroe).
The great chateaux of Bordeaux struggle to accommodate the voracious appetite for their rare, expensive wines, which have become a powerful status symbol in booming China.
An Italian waiter fights off a criminal mastermind with his inherited powers of disguise.
A woman struggles to accept the death of her fiance and the secrets he kept from her as she rebuilds her life.
Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.
Suzanne Stone is an aspiring TV personality who will do anything to be in the spotlight- including enlisting 3 teenagers to kill her husband.

Lisa Templeton begins a new job as a cleaner at High Hopes Hospital, a mental institution in Amityville, Long Island. Initially delighted to get the job, Lisa soon realises that all is not as it seems.
Jesse becomes reunited with Willy three years after the whale's jump to freedom as the teenager tries to rescue the killer whale and other orcas from an oil spill.
A documentary filmmaker travels to Jellystone Park to shoot a project and soon crosses paths with Yogi Bear, his sidekick Boo-Boo, and Ranger Smith.
Documenting Joaquin Phoenix's transition from the acting world to a career as an aspiring rapper.
Tired of their mother's alcoholism and a string of her abusive boyfriends, two sisters plot to kill her.
A man with a thirst for revenge builds a full body armor from Kevlar and goes on a killing spree.
Two kids secretly take in stray dogs at a vacant hotel.
Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.
A woman stuck in permanent adolescence lies to her fiance about going on a retreat and spends the time hanging out with friends instead.

title: A Kid in King Arthur's Court

info.plot: After a young actress unknowingly eats her roommate's pot cupcakes, her day becomes a series of misadventures.
A modern-day take on William Shakespeare's 'Cymbeline'.
A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.
In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.

title: Man cheng jin dai huang jin jia

info.plot: During China's Tang dynasty the emperor has taken the princess of a neighboring province as wife. She has borne him two sons and raised his eldest. Now his control over his dominion is complete, including the royal family itself.
A young girl from South Los Angeles tries to make it to the National Spelling Bee.
The story of Anne Sullivan's struggle to teach the blind and deaf Helen Keller how to communicate.

title: The Adventures of Mickey Matson and the Copperhead Treasure

info.plot: Four Los Angelenos -- a mortician, an ex-con, a suicidal ex-priest, and a stripper -- are brought together on Christmas Eve by a mixture of circumstances.
The RAS agents, Miss Bianca and Bernard, race to Australia to save a boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher
An old man makes a long journey by tractor to mend his relationship with an ill brother.
One day, driving aimlessly around the outskirts of town after a trivial domestic quarrel, a writer named Tomas accidentally hits and kills a child. Will he be able to move on?
A young orphaned boy raised by underground cave-dwelling trash collectors tries to save his friends from an evil exterminator. Based on the children's novel 'Here Be Monsters' by Alan Snow.
A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.
Truckers form a mile long "convoy" in support of a trucker's vendetta with an abusive sheriff...Based on the country song of same title by C.W. McCall.
A chronicle of the days leading up to Jeff Buckley's performance at his father's tribute concert in 1991.

Having gotten a taste of college life, a drastically changed farm girl returns home for Thanksgiving break with her best friend, a flamboyant party animal who is clearly a fish out of water in a small farm town.
A jealous husband and his friends plot the kidnapping of his wife's lover with the intention of restoring his wounded ego.
Mr. Miyagi is back and he takes a new pupil under his wing; a troubled adolescent girl.
A mother and wife stricken with memory loss allows a dysfunctional family a second chance at harmony and happiness.
After losing a powerful orb, Kara, Superman's cousin, comes to Earth to retrieve it and instead finds herself up against a wicked witch.
Jamie, killed by neighborhood thugs, returns as a mystical figure named Jake (The Wraith) to gain revenge.
A romantic adventure about a legendary pilot's passion for dare-devil firefighting and his girl.
A dictatorial film director (Finch) hires an unknown actress (Novak) to play the lead role in a planned movie biography of a late, great Hollywood star.
Dolittle must save a forest and a bear's life.
An arrogant career woman plays a series of heartless mind-games with her boyfriend to "put him in line," only to discover that he has a few tricks up his own sleeve.
A drama centered on the efforts of John and Aileen Crowley to find a researcher who might have a cure for their two children's rare genetic disorder.
A man staying at a secluded historical mansion, finds his life being haunted by the presence of a spectre.
A group of teens arrive on an island for a rave--only to discover the island has been taken over by zombies. The group takes refuge in a house where they try to survive the night.
Norwegian winter, early 20th century. On the boys home Bastoy, a new inmate leads the boys to a violent uprising against a brutal regime. How far is he willing to go to attain freedom?
In 1950s Connecticut, a housewife faces a marital crisis and mounting racial tensions in the outside world.

Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with an old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara. Together with an old Indian fighter and a gambler, they help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher that is trying to steal their water.
While in post-war Berlin to cover the Potsdam Conference, an American military journalist is drawn into a murder investigation which involves his former mistress and his driver.
An elite hitman returns to erase his past only to find that somebody has messed with his future.
In the midst of a searing Florida heat wave, a woman convinces her lover, a small-town lawyer, to murder her rich husband.
An outcast half-wolf risks his life to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.
A serial killer returns to his hometown to stalk seven children who share the same birthday as the date he was allegedly put to rest.
Marion and Jack try to rekindle their relationship with a visit to Paris, home of Marion's parents -- and several of her ex-boyfriends.
A man tries to warn his brother away from the new girlfriend he brings home during Thanksgiving, but ends up becoming infatuated with her in the process.
Two best friends (Kate and Chloe) embark on a cross country trip back to their hometown to attempt to win a pageant that eluded them as children.
Based on the legendary true story of the Red Dog who united a disparate local community while roaming the Australian outback in search of his long lost master.

Rosie and Alex are best friends. They are suddenly separated when Alex and his family move from Dublin to America. Can their friendship survive years and miles? Will they gamble everything for true love?
A great white shark hunts the crew of a capsized sailboat along the Great Barrier Reef.
A security specialist is forced into robbing the bank that he's protecting, as a bid to pay off his family's ransom.
An international spy must clear his name in order to save himself from the organization that he used to work for.

Young Augusten Burroughs absorbs experiences that could make for a shocking memoir: the son of an alcoholic father and an unstable mother, he's handed off to his mother's therapist, Dr. Finch, and spends his adolescent years as a member of Finch's bizarre extended family.
A rising indie band travels to Spike Island, Cheshire, in May of 1990 to see The Stone Roses.
A 12 year old boy and his mother become the targets of two warring werewolf packs, each with different intentions and motives.
Raze, a horror/action film, focuses on two abducted women & 50 other women who are forced to fight each other using their bare hands.

title: Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood

info.plot: After years of mother-daughter tension, Siddalee receives a scrapbook detailing the wild adventures of the "Ya-Yas", her mother's girlhood friends.
A photographer is trapped in Cambodia during tyrant Pol Pot's bloody "Year Zero" cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million "undesirable" civilians.
Ex-Green Beret hapkido expert saves wild horses from being slaughtered for dog food and helps protect a desert "freedom school" for runaway.
A look at a few chapters in the life of Poppy, a cheery, colorful, North London schoolteacher whose optimism tends to exasperate those around her.
A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.
When a fisherman leaves to fight with the Greek army during WWII, his fiancee falls in love with the local Italian commander.

title: Mac & Devin Go to High School

info.plot: A comedy that follows two high school students -- one overachiever struggling to write his valedictorian speech, the other a senior now going on his 15th year of school.
A David and Goliath law drama about a drug-addicted lawyer who takes on a health supply corporation while battling his own personal demons.
A British couple return to Paris many years after their honeymoon there in an attempt to rejuvenate their marriage.
A group of youngsters kidnap a respected Mafia figure.
Three lifelong friends inhabiting a penthouse apartment find themselves at odds when one of them attempts to move in with his girlfriend and another's little sister makes a surprise visit.
Story takes place in 1910, as two men - an assassin and a government agent with a hidden connection to him - try to stop an organization behind an arms smuggling ring.
A car magnate watches his personal and professional life hit the skids because of his business and romantic indiscretions.

While on a trip to Thailand, a successful American businessman tries to radically change his life. Back in New York, his wife and daughter find their relationship with their live-in Filipino maid changing around them. At the same time, in the Philippines, the maid's family struggles to deal with her absence.
A former criminal is drawn into a criminal endeavor and subsequently finds himself living an inexplicable new life working at a psychiatric facility.
An emotionally-beaten man with his young daughter moves to his ancestral home in Newfoundland to reclaim his life.
Four friends hit the road to LA to compete in the Cyberbowl Video Game Championship, but will they be able to compete with the worst hangovers of their lives?
Because of his insistence that his companion is an invisible six-foot rabbit, a whimsical middle-aged man is thought by his family to be insane - but the man might be wiser than anyone knows.
The true story of how a marine sea lion named Andre befriended a little girl and her family, circa 1962.
A collection of twentysomethings try to cope with relationships, loneliness, desire and their individual neuroses.
Activists arrive in Seattle, Washington en masse to protest a meeting of the World Trade Organization. Riots and chaos ensue as demonstrators successfully stop the WTO meetings.
A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the district attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.
A true tale of love, liberty and scandal amongst the Edwardian artists' colony in Cornwall
A new kid in town assembles a fledgling rock band -- together, they achieve their dreams and compete against the best in the biggest event of the year, a battle of the bands.

The hit musical based on the life of Evita Duarte, a B-picture Argentinian actress who eventually became the wife of Argentinian president Juan Peron, and the most beloved and hated woman in Argentina.
A comedy about a New York City couple (Schreiber and Hunt) in romantic crisis.
Several months after witnessing a murder, residents of Tower Block 31 find themselves being picked off by a sniper, pitting those lucky enough to be alive into a battle for survival.

A man coping with the institutionalization of his wife because of Alzheimer's disease faces an epiphany when she transfers her affections to another man, Aubrey, a wheelchair-bound mute who also is a patient at the nursing home.
A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?
An unhappily married woman struggles to break free from social pressures.
A psychic works with the FBI in order to hunt down a serial killer.

Chopper tells the intense story of Mark "Chopper" Read, a legendary criminal who wrote his autobiography while serving a jail sentence in prison. His book, "From the Inside", upon which the film is based, was a best-seller.
A successful executive and womanizer finds his lifestyle choices have turned back on him when his new female boss turns out to be an even bigger deviant then he is.

title: Those Magnificent Men in Their Flying Machines or How I Flew from London to Paris in 25 hours 11 minutes

info.plot: Sabotage efforts damage an international air race.

title: St Trinian's 2: The Legend of Fritton's Gold

info.plot: The girls of St. Trinians are on the hunt for buried treasure after discovering headmistress Miss Fritton is related to a famous pirate.
To avoid a potentially explosive scandal when the U.S. President goes into a coma, an affable temp agency owner with an uncanny resemblance, is put in his place.
The film adaptation of the H.G.Wells story told on radio of the invasion of Earth by Martians.
In a remote woodland cabin, a small town doctor discovers Nell - a beautiful young hermit woman with many secrets.
An airline security expert must take action when he finds himself trapped on a passenger jet when terrorists seize control of it.
During the Vietnam War, a soldier finds himself the outsider of his own squad when they unnecessarily kidnap a female villager.

title: How to Make Love to a Woman

info.plot: A boy brings a yellow dog home. The dog loves the family as much as they love him, but can the love last ?

Seven friends on a road trip to Las Vegas break down near a rest-stop motel, where they encounter a seemingly helpful group of people. Convinced to stay overnight, the friends wake up in their rooms to a gruesome and bloody terror.

title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?

info.plot: A former child star torments her crippled sister in a decaying Hollywood mansion.
A dramatization of one man's rescue of Jewish refugees in the Nazi-occupied Polish city of Lvov.
A pair of buddies conspire to save their best friend from marrying the wrong woman.
A former NCAA champion wrestler is paroled after 10 years in prison. Now, to save a friend's life, in a series of cage fights he must agree to do the impossible - lose.
The true story of the formation of Ian Fleming's 30 Commando unit, a precursor for the elite forces in the U.K.
A young man who escaped the clutches of a murderous hitch-hiker is subsequently stalked, framed for the hitcher's crimes, and has his life made into hell by the same man he escaped.
A female aerobics instructor meets a male reporter doing a story on health clubs, but it isn't love at first sight.
The Looney Tunes search for a man's missing father and the mythical Blue Monkey diamond.
After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.
A soldier suffering from battle fatigue meets a young woman on Christmas furlough from prison and their mutual loneliness blossoms into romance.
A look at the top-secret, high-tech espionage war going on between cats and dogs, which their human owners are blissfully unaware of.
Three teenagers go on a wild weekend of drink, drugs, shop-lifting and stealing cars that quickly spins beyond their control.
Two stumblebum inheritors are determined to rid their antique house of a mouse who is equally determined to stay where he is.
The story deals with the characters Pistolero, the Gent and Comanche and the deadly, unfinished business among them.
A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.
Two friends try sharing an apartment, but their ideas of housekeeping and lifestyles are as different as night and day.
A hot shot Washington DC lobbyist and his protege go down hard as their schemes to peddle influence lead to corruption and murder.
An architect's desire to speak with his wife from beyond the grave, becomes an obsession with supernatural repercussions.
'Breakin': A struggling young jazz dancer (Lucinda Dickey) meets up with two break-dancers. Together they become the sensation of the street crowds. Features ICE-T in his film debut as a club MC.
After a childhood friend's death, Jake Taylor, an all-star athlete must change his life - and sacrifice his dreams to save the lives of others.

As sadomasochistic yakuza enforcer Kakihara searches for his missing boss he comes across Ichi, a repressed and psychotic killer who may be able to inflict levels of pain that Kakihara has only dreamed of.
A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic detective ability.
A Witness Protection specialist becomes suspicious of his co-workers when dealing with a case involving high-tech weapons.
The true-life story of Paul Ferris.
The first daughter of the U.S. President heads off to college where she falls for a graduate student with a secret agenda.
A Parisian tailor finds himself posing as a baron in order to collect a sizeable bill from an aristocrat, only to fall in love with an aloof young princess.
A guy in his mid-thirties watches as his life comically unravels after he enters into a relationship with the daughter of a former high school classmate.
A woman's world is rocked when she discovers her husband is cheating on her.
An unhappy and disliked image consultant gets a second shot at life when an eight year old version of himself mysteriously appears.
British mountain climber, George Mallory, makes multiple attempts to scale Mt. Everest throughout the 1920s.

title: Things We Lost in the Fire

info.plot: A recent widow invites her husband's troubled best friend to live with her and her two children. As he gradually turns his life around, he helps the family cope and confront their loss.
Alice hires a professional negotiator to obtain the release of her engineer husband, who has been kidnapped by anti-government guerrillas in South America.
When a teen is bullied, his brother and friends lure the bully into the woods to seek vengeance.

A grieving father in a downward spiral stumbles across a box of his recently deceased son's demo tapes and lyrics. Shocked by the discovery of this unknown talent, he forms a band in the hope of finding some catharsis.
Released from prison for a crime he didn't commit, an ex-con targets the same bank he was sent away for robbing.

When a Vienna museum guard befriends an enigmatic visitor, the grand Kunsthistorisches Art Museum becomes a mysterious crossroads which sparks explorations of their lives, the city, and the ways artworks reflect and shape the world.
As Allen Ginsberg talks about his life and art, his most famous poem is illustrated in animation while the obscenity trial of the work is dramatized.

This film is an adaptation of the Shakespeare play "Titus Andronicus." Titus returns victorious from war, only to plant the seeds of future turmoil for himself and his family. Who says revenge is sweet?
A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.
A ghost tries to sabotage her former boyfriend's current relationship with a psychic.
Before leaving for college, a recently dumped goth girl's life changes forever when she falls in love with a smart and professional college grad who is staying in the family's guest house.
An ad executive comes up with a campaign to defeat Augusto Pinochet in Chile's 1988 referendum.
Mischievous grandma Madea lands in jail, where she meets a variety of mixed-up characters.
Zane, an astronomer discovers intelligent alien life. But the aliens are keeping a deadly secret, and will do anything to stop Zane from learning it.

title: The Adventurer: The Curse of the Midas Box

info.plot: The new kid in town stumbles across something sinister about the town's method of transforming its unruly teens into upstanding citizens.
In 1940, the British Royal Air Force fights a desperate battle vs. the Nazi Germany Air Force for control of British air space to prevent a Nazi invasion of Britain.
A woman must contend with rival strippers and her boss in an attempt to make a legitimate living.
Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

A group of delinquents are sent to clean the Blackwell Hotel. Little do they know reclusive psychopath Jacob Goodnight (Jacobs) has holed away in the rotting hotel. When one of the teens is captured, those who remain -- a group that includes the cop who put a bullet in Goodnight's head four years ago -- band together to survive against the brutal killer.
A college professor travels to New York City to attend a conference and finds a young couple living in his apartment.

During the First World War, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German POW camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are sent to a seemingly impenetrable fortress which seems impossible to escape from.
An unusual road trip movie about a mother driving her two sons from New York to Pittsburgh to St. Louis and eventually Hollywood in her quest to find a man to take care of them all.
A globetrotting hitman and a crestfallen businessman meet in a hotel bar in Mexico City in an encounter that draws them together in a way neither expected.
An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President seriously, and embarks on a cross-country journey.

A cowardly boy who buries himself in accident statistics enters a library to escape a storm only to be transformed into an animated illustration by the Pagemaster. He has to work through obstacles from classic books to return to real life.

In the Yorkshire countryside, working-class tomboy Mona meets the exotic, pampered Tamsin. Over the summer season, the two young women discover they have much to teach one another, and much to explore together.
This is the story of a dysfunctional New York family, and their attempts to reconcile.
A young teenage werewolf (Bruckner) is torn between honoring her family's secret and her love for a man (Dancy).
The true story of a young journalist who fell from grace when it was found he had fabricated over half of his articles.

Insp. Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of International detectives who are just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.
An classical art professor and collector, who doubles as a professional assassin, is coerced out of retirement to avenge the murder of an old friend.
A group of recruits go through Advanced Infantry Training at Fort Polk, Louisiana's infamous Tigerland, last stop before Vietnam for tens of thousands of young men in 1971.
A father tries to track down his kidnapped daughter.
A group of friends get together for a murder mystery party, but things take a dark turn when one hijacks the evening and is out for blood.
A struggling agent for child actors and former child star himself, Howard Holloway spends years losing his most talented clients to his slick, arch-nemesis Aldo Shocklee.
The tiny girl meets a fairy prince who saves her from the creatures of the woods.
A rich college kid is taught a lesson after a joy ride ends up destroying a country restaurant.
Film version of Jacqueline Susann's best-selling novel chronicling the rise and fall of three young ladies in show business.
The romance between two teenagers turns obsessive, dark, and disastrous.
The Gremlins are back, and this time, they've taken total control over the building of a media mogul.
A New England couple's college-aged son dates an older woman who has two small children and an unwelcome ex-husband.
During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.
A leukemia patient attempts to end a 20-year feud with her sister to get her bone marrow.

A producer's film is endangered when his star walks off, so he decides to digitally create an actress to substitute for the star, becoming an overnight sensation that everyone thinks is a real person.
A teenager is cast in the Mercury Theatre production of "Julius Caesar" directed by a young Orson Welles in 1937.
A young man's peculiar upbringing renders him unable to competently cope with the struggle of growing up.
After Lucas Nickle floods an ant colony with his watergun, he's magically shrunken down to insect size and sentenced to hard labor in the ruins.
Freddy Krueger returns once again to haunt both the dreams of his daughter and Springwood's last surviving teenager.
Logline is being kept under wraps.
The story of a girl who makes dreams come true.
Plot unknown.

In the ironically named city of Paradise, a recently laid-off loser teams up with his cult-leading uncle to steal a peculiar bounty of riches from their local amusement park; somehow, the recently arrived Taliban have a similar focus, but a far more sinister intent.
A guy tries to determine what he will do in the final moments of his life.
3 people marooned on a desert island, only one will survive.
Mobster Paul Vitti is released into Dr. Ben Sobol's care, where only more chaos ensues.

title: Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus

info.plot: Turning her back on her wealthy, established family, Diane Arbus falls in love with Lionel Sweeney, an enigmatic mentor who introduces Arbus to the marginalized people who help her become one of the most revered photographers of the twentieth century.
In 1890s London, two friends use the same pseudonym ("Ernest") for their on-the-sly activities. Hilarity ensues.
An acclaimed college hoops coach is demoted to a junior varsity team after a public meltdown.
In 1976, Tony Wilson sets up Factory Records and brings Manchester's music to the world.
A computer programmer's dream job at a hot Portland-based firm turns nightmarish when he discovers his boss has a secret and ruthless means of dispatching anti-trust problems.
A meek milquetoast of a clerk is mistaken for Public Enemy #1, and the notorious killer takes advantage of the situation.
A woman tries to exonerate her brother, who was convicted of murder, by proving that the crime was committed by a supernatural phenomenon.
"Juice" is about 4 inner-city teens who get caught up in the pursuit of power and happiness, which they refer to as 'the juice'.
A loser finds success in the revenge-for-hire business.
A bitter ex-husband. A put upon momma's boy. Both want their respective spouse and mother dead, but who will pull it off?
The original '70s TV family is now placed in the 1990s, where they're even more square and out of place than ever.
When their daughter is kidnapped by experienced nappers (Bacon and Love), the Jennings' (Theron and Townsend) turn the tables on this seemingly foolproof plan.
An engaged couple's backpacking trip in the Caucasus Mountains is derailed by a single misstep that threatens to undo everything the pair believed about each other and about themselves.
A tough Russian policeman is forced to partner up with a cocky Chicago police detective when he is sent to Chicago to apprehend a Georgian drug lord who killed his partner and fled the country.
A look at the life-changing connection between a retired and widowed American philosophy professor and a young Parisian woman.
Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to help Taggart and Rosewood investigate Chief Bogamil's near-fatal shooting and the series of "alphabet crimes" associated with it.
Three young Irish women struggle to maintain their spirits while they endure dehumanizing abuse as inmates of a Magdalene Sisters Asylum.
Filmmaker [link=nm0601619] explores the roots of America's predilection for gun violence.

title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master

info.plot: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may know the way to defeat him for good.
A group of rabbits flee their doomed warren and face many dangers to find and protect their new home.
After his wife is murdered, a man drifts into a world populated by thugs and speed junkies.
A cynically selfish TV executive gets haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.
A contemporary story of love, rejection and triumph as a young Maori girl fights to fulfill a destiny her grandfather refuses to recognize.
When the Russian mob kidnaps the daughter of a reformed criminal, he rounds up his old crew and seeks his own brand of justice.
A teenager attends a fantasy writers' convention where he discovers his idea has been stolen by an established novelist.
A traveling art saleswoman tries to shake off a flaky motel manager who falls for her and won't leave her alone.
A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

When a colossal tectonic shift causes the sea level to start rising, a microbiologist gathers the DNA of as many species as she can, while the military creates an "ark" in a desperate attempt to preserve life on Earth.

title: So I Married an Axe Murderer

info.plot: A San Francisco poet who fears commitment has a girlfriend who he suspects may not be who she appears.
A local public station gets a new owner. The station becomes a hit, with all sorts of hilarious sight gags and wacky humor.
The gritty adaption of William Shakespeare's play about the English King's bloody conquest of France.
After leaving jail, Victor is still in love with Elena, but she's married to the former cop -now basketball player- who became paralysed by a shot from Victor's gun...
A recently laid off factory worker kidnaps his former boss' daughter, hoping to use the ransom money to pay for his sister's kidney transplant.
When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.
A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug- and organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.
In 30's New York City, the Shadow battles his nemesis, Shiwan Khan, who is building an atomic bomb.
A group of six ex-high school cheerleaders are stalked by a killer with a medieval war hammer and battle axe during their first Spring Break from college.
When an accident miraculously gives a boy an incredibly powerful pitching arm, he becomes a major league pitcher for the Chicago Cubs.
At the opening party of a collosal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.
A group of passengers struggle to survive and escape, when their ocean liner completely capsizes at sea.
English naturalist Charles Darwin struggles to find a balance between his revolutionary theories on evolution and the relationship with religious wife, whose faith contradicts his work.

Michael Moore's view on what happened to the United States after September 11; and how the Bush Administration allegedly used the tragic event to push forward its agenda for unjust wars in Afghanistan and Iraq.

Dolph Springer wakes up one morning to realize he has lost the love of his life, his dog, Paul. During his quest to get Paul (and his life) back, Dolph radically changes the lives of others -- risking his sanity all the while.

title: Halloween III: Season of the Witch

info.plot: A large Halloween mask-making company has plans to kill millions of American children with something sinister hidden in Halloween masks.
A young cattle farmer is approached by a veterinarian to make a deal with a notorious beef trader.
Two cops, played by Seagal and Wayans, are forced to work together to solve a chain of mysterious killings by a killer nicknamed "The Family Man"
Rahul loses his fans and fame due to alcoholism. But he then decides to turn a small time singer into a rising star.
A psychological thriller based on the concept of anamorphosis, a painting technique that manipulates the laws of perspective to create two competing images on a single canvas.
The weeks leading up to a young couple's wedding is comic and stressful, especially as their respective fathers try to lay to rest their feud.
After watching their best friend get murdered, a group of teens struggle to expose a local hero as the vicious killer and keep from becoming his next victims.
A mentally retarded girl proves herself to be every bit as capable as her "perfect" sister when she moves into an apartment and begins going to college.

title: I Think I Love My Wife

info.plot: A married man who daydreams about being with other women finds his will and morals tested after he's visited by the ex-mistress of his old friend.
A French woman mourning over the death of her husband three years prior is courted by a Swedish co-worker.
Final entry in a trilogy of films dealing with contemporary French society concerns a model who discovers her neighbour is keen on invading people's privacy.
A genius 16-year-old 18th century poet and his mentor fall for each other, but, over time, their romantic relationship becomes bitter and violent.
A group of slackers who are living for free in a rock star's mansion find their sweet lives threatened when the musician decides to sell his pad.
A recently widowed detective still grieving over his wife's death discovers a shocking connection between a serial killing spree and the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.
Insightful look at an unattractive 7th grader as she struggles to cope with un-attentive parents, snobbish classmates, a smart older brother, an attractive younger sister, and her own insecurities.
A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.
An American intern at U.K. Vogue helps her friends find love.
Mommie Dearest, best selling memoir, turned motion picture, depicts the abusive and traumatic adoptive upbringing of Christina Crawford at the hands of her mother...screen queen Joan Crawford.

While planning her family reunion, a pistol-packing grandma (Perry) must contend with the other dramas on her plate, including the runaway who has been placed under her care, and her love-troubled nieces.
A twenty-nine year-old slacker who lives with his mom realizes his sweet set-up is threatened when she hears wedding bells with her self-help guru beau.
Alejandra and her dad Roberto have just moved to town. She is new at school, he has a new job. Starting over is sometimes complicated when you have left so much behind.
A teenage boy's descent into the dangerous world of the Internet and the harrowing consequences of his actions. A true story.
In modern-day Paris, a journalist finds her life becoming entwined with a young girl whose family was torn apart during the notorious Vel' d'Hiv Roundup in 1942.
A comedian who hosts a news satire program decides to run for president, and a computerized voting machine malfunction gets him elected.
A florist, who abides by a strict five-date-limit with any man, finds herself wanting more with the new restaurateur in town.
Two Australian sprinters face the brutal realities of war when they are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign in Turkey during World War I.

On the run with the law on their trail, America's most anguished vampire family heads to England to find an ancient vampire clan. What they find instead could tear their family, and their throats, apart forever.
An Arab immigrant wins the American green card lottery, arriving in New York City on September 10, 2001.

Suffering from writer's block and eagerly awaiting his writing award, Harry Block remembers events from his past and scenes from his best-selling books as characters, real and fictional, come back to haunt him.
After entering a beauty contest in Tijuana, a young woman witnesses drug-related murders and is forced to do the gang's bidding.
Small-town love story of a young man with a reputation for womanizing and his best friend's sister.
The picaresque and touching story of the politically incorrect, fully lived life of the impulsive, irascible and fearlessly blunt Barney Panofsky.
A road trip through Louisiana transforms three strangers who were originally brought together by their respective feelings of loneliness.
A day in the life of a group of troubled 15-year-olds growing up in west London.
An Irish immigrant family adjusts to life in the United States.
The plot is unknown at this time.
Young punk Otto becomes a repo man after helping to steal a car, and stumbles into a world of wackiness as a result.
Set over the course of one day, a narcotics detective hunts for a seemingly harmless young criminal who knows a truth about the cop's past.
Three college students set out to document what other people dread most.
After losing his job, a journalist reluctantly agrees to help his oddball friend with his bid to earn a seat on the Seattle City Council.
A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum.
The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.
Biography of Loretta Lynn, a country and western singer that came from poverty to fame.
Two women are arrested for smuggling while vacationing in Thailand.
A young married couple comes home from a date night to discover that they are imprisoned in their own house with a methodical killer inside.
A father, who can't keep his promises, dies in a car accident. One year later, he returns as a snowman, who has the final chance to put things right with his son before he is gone forever.
An unimpressive, every-day man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.
After an encounter with a neck-biter, a publishing executive thinks that he's turning into a vampire.
A sheltered young high society woman joins the army on a whim and finds herself in a more difficult situation than she ever expected.
A story of slavery, set in the 1930s American South.
A man meets up with two "good guys" to recover what is unlawfully his, taking them on his whirlwind ride, doing things they never would have imagined, just to survive.
A thief turned ex-con poses as a cop to retrieve a diamond he stole years ago.
Businessman Wesley Deeds is jolted out of his scripted life when he meets Lindsey, a single mother who works on the cleaning crew in his office building.
A strange lifeform consumes everything in its path as it grows and grows.
The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.
The friends of a night watchman, at a highly secured self storage facility, are home from college and looking to party.
When young girls start to go missing within a religious cult, older followers fear a long-told prophecy while the younger members suspect abusive elders are killing them off.
An eight year old boy is thought to be lazy and a troublemaker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.
A Miami businesswoman adjusts to her new life in a tiny Minnesota town.
On a trip to a Mexican border town, three college friends stumble upon a human-sacrifice cult.

On the night of a sleepover, a group of teenage girls venture out in a competitive game of challenging dares. As the antics escalate, and the dares become more extreme, the girls unravel the truth behind a former student's rumored suicide.
GRIFFIN AND PHOENIX is a poignantly funny love story about two people who face a seemingly insurmountable obstacle that may stand between them and a last chance at love.

Kate and Martin escape from personal tragedy to an Island Retreat. Cut off from the outside world, their attempts to recover are shattered when a Man is washed ashore, with news of airborne killer disease that is sweeping through Europe.
A compilation of interviews, rehearsals and backstage footage of Michael Jackson as he prepared for his series of sold-out shows in London.
A look at the life of legendary American pilot Amelia Earhart, who disappeared while flying over the Pacific Ocean in 1937 in an attempt to make a flight around the world.
When the trail goes cold on a murder investigation of a policeman an undercover narcotics officer is lured back to the force to help solve the case.
Aliens abduct all adults; genius Jimmy and his friends build an interstellar spacefleet and rescue them.
An American woman, trapped in Islamic Iran by her brutish husband, must find a way to escape with her daughter as well.
A deadly drought in 1942 takes its toll on central China's Henan province during the war against Japan.
A landscape architect's dealings with a young thief cause him to re-evaluate his life.
A day in the life of a South Side Chicago barbershop.
Dr. Caligari's somnambulist, Cesare, and his deadly predictions.
After a one night stand with Isabel, Alex realizes that she is pregnant and they decide to get married. However, along with the marriage comes compromise of one's own cultural traditions.
Strangers looking for a woman's father arrive at a tropical island where a doctor desperately searches for the cause and cure of a recent epidemic of the undead.

Two childhood friends, a New York hairstylist and a would-be musician, get caught up with the mob and are forced to deliver $50,000 to Australia, but things go haywire when the money is lost to a wild kangaroo.
A filmmaker (van den Driessche) holds a series of boundary-pushing auditions for his project about female pleasure.
Ambitious singer must struggle with her musical career, her love life and to bring up her daughter by herself.
A secret service agent is framed as the mole in an assassination attempt on the president. He must clear his name and foil another assassination attempt while on the run from a relentless FBI agent.
A single African-American mother struggles to clear her name after being wrongly accused and arrested for dealing drugs in an impoverished town in Texas.
A series of short films set around the theme of infidelity.
A big-city reporter travels to the small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman that she works for as a maid.
A young man, broke and jobless, abducts three rich college kids to try and get money from their fathers.
A British team is sent to cross occupied Greek territory and destroy the massive German gun emplacement that commands a key sea channel.
Kurt Sloane must learn the ancient kick boxing art of Muay Thai in order to avenge his brother.

Worried that he has gotten the free-spirited Mindy pregnant after an unprotected one-night stand, Fred feigns romantic interest and sticks by her side for twelve hours to make sure she takes both doses of the morning-after pill.
In Hamburg, German-Greek chef Zinos unknowingly disturbs the peace in his locals-only restaurant by hiring a more talented chef.
A businessman is reunited with the four lost souls who were his guardian angels during childhood, all with a particular purpose to joining the afterlife.
An Arab surgeon living in Tel Aviv discovers a dark secret about his wife in the aftermath of a suicide bombing.
The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.
A United States Navy destroyer escort participates in a Navy "invisibility" experiment that inadvertently sends two sailors 40 years into the future.

Two college roommates go out and party, resulting in bad grades. They learn of the clause that says, "If your roommate dies, you get an A," and decide to find someone who is on the verge, so to speak, to move in with them.
When geek Ethan discovers three fellow students scamming the exam system, he blackmails them to win over the college's most popular girl.
A small Maryland town is gripped by a curse which causes residents to take their own life one after another.
An adventure set in the early part of the 20th century and focused on a popular novelist and her dealings with would-be suitors, the cops, monsters, and other distractions.
A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.
Desperate to get out from under her overprotective mother, a home-schooled teen runs off to live with her dad, and forms a bond with his much-younger boyfriend.
A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.
A washed up pitcher flashes through his career.
When talk radio host Emma Lloyd advises one of her listeners to break up with her boyfriend, the jilted ex sets about getting his revenge.
A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped put in jail.
Shipwrecked on an island, the castaway boys eventually revert to savagery despite the few rational kids' attempts to prevent that.
While traveling across country with her fiance, Beth wakes alone in an isolated clinic to a mother's worst nightmare. Just how far will she go to save her child?
A woman snoops through her boyfriend's palm pilot and reveals his former girlfriends, which causes her to question why they're still listed in his little black book.
